Package omp2gpu.transforms

Class TransformTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • omp2gpu.transforms.TransformTools
  • public abstract class TransformTools
extends java.lang.Object
    TransformTools provides tools for various transformation tools for OpenMP-to-CUDA translation.

    • Method Detail

      • getTempIndex

        public static Identifier getTempIndex​(Traversable where,
                                      int trailer)
        Get a temporary integer variable that can be used as a loop index variable or other temporary data holder. The name of the variable is decided by using the trailer value, and if the variable with the given name exists in a region, where, this function returns the existing variable. Otherwise, this function create a new variable with the given name. This function differs from Tools.getTemp() in two ways; first if the temporary variable exits in the region, this function returns existing one, but Tools.getTemp() creates another new one. Second, if the temporary variable does not exist in the region, this function creates the new variable, but Tools.getTemp() searches parents of the region and creates the new variable only if none of parents contains the temporary variable.
        Parameters:
        where - code region from where temporary variable is searched or created.
        trailer - integer trailer that is used to create/search a variable name
        Returns:

      • getNewTempIndex

        Get a new temporary integer variable, which has not been created by getTempIndex() method.
        Parameters:
        where -
        Returns:

      • privatizeSharedData

        public static void privatizeSharedData​(java.util.HashMap map,
                                       CompoundStatement region)
        If shared variable in a parallel region is used as private/firstprivate variable in a omp-for loop in the parallel region, the shared variable is privatized in the omp-for loop and initialization statement is added if the shared variable is used as a firstprivate variable.
        Parameters:
        map -
        region -

      • calcLoopItrSize

        public static java.util.Set<Symbol> calcLoopItrSize​(Statement region,
                                                    java.util.HashMap map)
        Calculate the iteration space sizes of omp-for loops existing in a parallel region. This calculation should be done before the parallel region is transformed into a kernel function.
        Parameters:
        region - parallel region to be searched
        map - annotation map beloning to the parallel region, region
        Returns:
        set of symbols used in calculating iteration space

      • getRInitValue

        public static Expression getRInitValue​(BinaryOperator redOp,
                                       java.util.List specList)
        Find appropriate initialization value for a given reduction operator and variable type.
        Parameters:
        redOp - reductioin operator
        specList - list containing type specifiers of the reduction variable
        Returns:
        initialization value for the reduction variable

      • RedExpression

        public static AssignmentExpression RedExpression​(Expression RedExp,
                                                 BinaryOperator redOp,
                                                 Expression Rexp)
        Create a reduction assignment expression for the given reduction operator. This function is used to perform both in-block partial reduction and across- block final reduction. [CAUTION] the partial results of a subtraction reduction are added to form the final value.
        Parameters:
        RedExp - expression of reduction variable/array
        redOp - reduction operator
        Rexp - right-hand-side expression
        Returns:
        reduction assignment expression

      • updateAnnotationsInRegion

        public static void updateAnnotationsInRegion​(Traversable region,
                                             boolean useAccessedSymbols)
        Update information of OmpAnnotations contained in the region. If input region is a cloned one, cloning of the original OmpAnnotations will do a shallow copy of the HashMap instance: the keys and values themselves are not cloned. For each OmpAnnotation in the input region, - shared, private, reduction, and threadprivate data sets are updated. [CAUTION] this method does not update symbol pointers of Identifiers in the input region.
        Parameters:
        region - code region where OmpAnnotations will be updated.
        useAccessedSymbols - use symbols accessed in the input region when updating old symbols in OmpAnnotations. If Identifiers in the input region have correct symbol pointers, set useAccessSymbols true. Otherwise, set this false.

      • addStatementBefore

        public static void addStatementBefore​(CompoundStatement parent,
                                      Statement ref_stmt,
                                      Statement new_stmt)
        Add a statement before the ref_stmt in the parent CompoundStatement. This method can be used to insert declaration statement before the ref_stmt, which is not allowed in CompoundStatement.addStatementBefore() method.
        Parameters:
        parent - parent CompoundStatement containing the ref_stmt as a child
        ref_stmt - reference statement
        new_stmt - new statement to be added

      • addStatementAfter

        public static void addStatementAfter​(CompoundStatement parent,
                                     Statement ref_stmt,
                                     Statement new_stmt)
        Add a statement after the ref_stmt in the parent CompoundStatement. This method can be used to insert declaration statement after the ref_stmt, which is not allowed in CompoundStatement.addStatementAfter() method.
        Parameters:
        parent - parent CompoundStatement containing the ref_stmt as a child
        ref_stmt - reference statement
        new_stmt - new statement to be added

      • removeChild

        public static void removeChild​(Traversable parent,
                               Traversable child)
        Remove a child from a parent; this method is used to delete ProcedureDeclaration when both Procedure and ProcedureDeclaration need to be deleted. TranslationUnit symbol table contains only one entry for both, and thus TranslationUnit.removeChild() complains an error when trying to delete both of them.
        Parameters:
        parent - parent traversable containing the child
        child - child traversable to be removed

      • updateOmpMapForCalledFunc

        public static java.util.HashMap updateOmpMapForCalledFunc​(java.util.HashMap par_map,
                                                          java.util.List<Expression> argList,
                                                          Procedure proc)
        Create a HashMap which contains updated shared, reduction, private, and threadprivate data sets for the function called in a Omp parallel region. Depending on the sharing attributes of the actual arguments of the called function, corresponding formal parameters are assigned to one of HashSets (shared, reduction, private, and threadprivate sets) in the HashMap. In addition, shared data that are accessed in the called function, but not passed as parameters are added into the new shared set, and all local variables are added to the new private set.
        Parameters:
        par_map - HashMap of an enclosing parallel region.
        argList - List of actual arguments passed into the function proc.
        proc - Procedure that is called in a parallel region.
        Returns:
        New HashMap that contains updated shared, private, and threadprivate data sets.

      • updateOmpMapForCalledFunc2

        public static java.util.HashMap updateOmpMapForCalledFunc2​(java.util.HashMap par_map,
                                                           java.util.List<Expression> argList,
                                                           Procedure proc)
        Create a HashMap which contains updated shared, reduction, private, and threadprivate data sets for the function called in a Omp parallel region. Depending on the sharing attributes of the actual arguments of the called function, corresponding formal parameters are assigned to one of HashSets (shared, reduction, private, and threadprivate sets) in the HashMap. In addition, shared data that are accessed in the called function, but not passed as parameters are added into the new shared set, and all local variables are added to the new private set. This method differs from updateOmpMapForCalledFunc() in that this method uses symbol-name-based analysis while the other uses symbol-based analysis.
        Parameters:
        par_map - HashMap of an enclosing parallel region.
        argList - List of actual arguments passed into the function proc.
        proc - Procedure that is called in a parallel region.
        Returns:
        New HashMap that contains updated shared, private, and threadprivate data sets.

        public static void removeUnusedSymbols​(Program prog)

      • wrapOmpParallelForLoops

        public static void wrapOmpParallelForLoops​(Program prog)
        Wrap omp-parallel-for loops using compoundStatement if the parallel-for loops contain reduction clauses. This wrapping is needed to prevent a possible deadlock caused by reduction transformation in O2GTranslator.
        Parameters:
        prog -
